objects.text:
• Authentic luxury fragrance
• Long-lasting masculine scent
• Premium design with magnetic cap

product_details.name: Dior Sauvage EDP - The Essence of Untamed Elegance
product_details.description:
• Authentic Dior luxury fragrance - Eau de Parfum concentration
• Sophisticated deep blue glass bottle with signature Dior design
• Long-lasting aromatic-spicy masculine scent
• Premium quality ribbed cap with magnetic closure
• Perfect blend of fresh and woody notes
• Ideal for both day and evening wear
• Prestigious French craftsmanship
• Distinctive and modern fragrance signature
• Professional-grade atomizer for perfect dispersion
• Elegant addition to any gentleman's collection

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and sophisticated perfume advertisement with a split layout. The left section holds all textual and promotional elements, while the right side showcases a high-quality product image of a perfume bottle. At the top left, the brand name (id: "brand") is presented in clean, minimal typography emphasizing luxury. Below it, the main product name (id: "heading") stands out in bold white, followed by a subheading (id: "subheading") in a light blue tone. A refined tagline (id: "tagline") and a bullet-style product description (id: "description") highlight key features. The price (id: "price"), styled in futuristic blue, is placed prominently above a rectangular call-to-action button (id: "cta_background") with bold "SHOP NOW" text (id: "cta"). The background includes gradients, abstract curves, and light dot accents, adding depth and elegance.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Navy: `#0a1930`, `#0c1728`
- Accent Blue: `#6c93d8`
- Gradient Blue: `#1a3a6c`, `#3457a0`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image of Dior Sauvage Eau de Parfum presents a refined, masculine aesthetic through a deep, gradient color palette. The primary color is a rich midnight blue (#0B0F2B) that fades smoothly into a lighter cobalt blue (#1A2D65), creating a sense of depth and luxury. Highlights and reflections of electric blue (#0077FF) add contrast, giving the bottle a luminous and sophisticated finish. The white text (#FFFFFF) stands out crisply against the dark tones, ensuring readability and elegance. These colors are blended seamlessly to evoke freshness, modernity, and strength—ideal for an ad banner featuring dark gradients with bold text overlays.
